name: Ricochet Shot (Ranger)
description: Charge an arrow and shoot it towards your reticle dealing 158 - 213 + 186% Weapon Damage. The arrow will ricochet to a second target within 6m and then ricochet to a third target. If you hit 3 targets with this power, you gain the Hot Shot buff which applies 10 Critical Hit Damage for 10 seconds.
